bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ke wu si 客忤死 , [appearance of] death from a visitor’s hostility. Jia you bu zhu Shen nong ben cao 嘉祐補註神農本草 Substance Entry re tang 熱湯：主忤死。先以衣三重 , 藉忤死人腹上 , 乃取銅器 若瓦器盛湯著衣上 , 湯冷者去衣 , 大冷者換湯 , 即愈 , “To master [the appearance of] death from hostility : First lay three pieces of garment on the abdomenof the person with [the appearance of] death from hostility . Then take a bronze or earth vessel, fill with hot water, and place on the garments. Once the hot water has cooled down, remove the garments. When it has become very cold, exchange it for hot water again. This brings the cure”.
